actions.in_committee: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy

official_title: To oppose Cuba's admission as a member of international financial institutions.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to instruct the U.S. executive directors to international financial institutions to oppose the admission of Cuba as a member of such institutions until Cuba holds free and fair internationally supervised elections and commits to compensate U.S. persons for property expropriated in Cuba.

titles.title: To oppose Cuba's admission as a member of international financial institutions.
